recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
directions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1/2 cup of pasta water before draining.
In a skillet, cook diced pancetta or bacon until crispy. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and grated Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and black pepper.
Add cooked spaghetti to the skillet with pancetta and garlic. Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg and cheese mixture. Add reserved pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately, garnished with additional grated Parmesan cheese and black pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
directions: In a large skillet or wok, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add minced garlic and sliced chicken breasts. Cook until chicken is no longer pink.
Add mixed vegetables to the skillet and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
In a small bowl, mix together soy sauce and oyster sauce. Pour over chicken and vegetables in the skillet. Stir to combine and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Serve hot over cooked rice.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
directions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a serving platter, alternating between them.
Tear fresh basil leaves and scatter over the tomatoes and mozzarella.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze and extra virgin olive oil.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve immediately as a refreshing salad or appetizer.

recipes.title: Vegetable Curry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (potatoes, carrots, bell peppers, peas)
directions: In a large pot, heat some oil over medium heat. Add chopped onion and minced garlic. Cook until softened and fragrant.
Stir in curry powder and cook for another minute.
Add coconut milk to the pot and bring to a simmer.
Add mixed vegetables to the pot and cook until tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot over cooked rice.
